means: 停止，终止，结束( cease的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The rain poured down without ceasing.
The sound of songs and every sort of music filled the ears without ceasing.
The reason of the law ceasing, the law itself ceases.
sentence.Network_cn: 法律理由消失, 法律本身也不存在.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Analysis of Ultrasound Image on Embryo Development Ceasing胚胎停止发育超声显像分析

2010届高考英语词组汇总 - 豆丁网 ... cause and effect 因果 268. cease doing 停止做某事 270. on the ceiling 在天花板上 271.

entry.def: If something ceases, it stops happening or existing.

example.ex: At one o'clock the rain had ceased.

entry.def: If you cease to do something, you stop doing it.

example.ex: He never ceases to amaze me...
The secrecy about the President's condition had ceased to matter...
example.tran: 总统的健康状况已经没有保密的必要。

entry.def: If you cease something, you stop it happening or working.

example.ex: The Tundra Times, a weekly newspaper in Alaska, ceased publication this week.
example.tran: 阿拉斯加的周报《苔原时报》本周停刊了。

auth_sentence.content: Rebel fighters are to immediately follow by ceasing all violence.
